Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Callie C. Argenton
Reviews.Content: I just received my computer and love it already. I was a very professional packaging. Computer look like a brand new one! It is just like it says in the description and came with all items! I really trust this company and definitely will do business again with y'allthank you so muchFred

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude E6420
Reviews.Author: L. Lloyd
Reviews.Content: Bought this from Data Sales and Co. Excellent seller, good customer service. I had  some problems with the audio initially but after updating the drivers, I have crystal clear sound.This is a beautiful, solidly built, fast laptop with Win 7 Pro, a  work horse that I use in the office; with bluetooth and integrated webcam it is all the technology I need right now. My wife thinks it is a bit heavy at 5 lbs, so female shoppers take note.I love it and will stick with this line for a work laptop. Not ready to jump on the tablet bandwagon just yet.

Reviews.Title: Dell Latitude E6420
Reviews.Author: G. Olson
Reviews.Content: Incredible machine. Drawbacks, touchpad. Dell needs to go to the Apple school for touchpads. I like the pullout drives, speed and HD LCD.
